name: Finance Sector Union
goal:
The Finance Sector Union of Norway (Finansforbundet) is a nonpolitical trade union for employees in the finance sector.
Our members are employees working in banking, insurance, IT, accounting, debt collection, financing, assurance and underwriting.

The Finance Sector Union of Norway is the only Norwegian trade union with in-depth knowledge and understanding of the finance sector.

Currently we have 39 000 members and 1100 company representatives.

Our vision;

In cooperation with employers, we aim to create Norway’s most attractive workplace for our members and create a sustainable financial sector

Our focus areas
•Pay
•Financial sector policies
•Employment law
•Career counceling
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment
euInitiatives:
EU regulations on Financial services
EU regulations on workers rights/employment
EU initiatives on social areas
Pensions
Dialogue With DG Fisma
